heroicTraits.name: Unbending Will
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
heroicTraits.lore: This general and their minions are a force of unliving conquest like no other.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly ****DEATHRATTLE**** or ****DEADWALKERS**** unit that has 2 or more models and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Add D6 to the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Lash of the Sire
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
heroicTraits.lore: Such is the domineering force of this undead overlord’s willpower that it can imbue nearby vassals with sudden impetus.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick another friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, if the target is not in combat, it can **move** D6". If the target is in combat, it can make a pile‑in **move**.

heroicTraits.name: Unhinged Rampager
heroicTraits.lore: This general’s bestial hunger sees them close on the foe without hesitation.
heroicTraits.effect: You can re-roll **charge** rolls for this unit in your **charge** phase.

regimentAbilities.name: Endless Legions
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: To the Soulblight aristocracy, the dead are mere chattel to be expended at will.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly ****Deathrattle** Skeletons** unit that has been destroyed.
regimentAbilities.effect: You can set up a replacement unit with **D6+4** models anywhere on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units.

regimentAbilities.name: Ruinous Chargers
regimentAbilities.lore: The Blood Knights of this army leave a trail of destruction as they trample anything that lies between them and their prey.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick your **Blood **Knights**** unit to use this ability if it charged this turn.
regimentAbilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on each enemy unit it passed across during that ****CHARGE**** ability.

artefactsOfPower.name: Amulet of Screams
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability for a WIZARD within 18" of this unit
artefactsOfPower.lore: The bearer of this amulet can flood the foe’s mind with the tormented howling of damned souls.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the caster equal to the roll. If the target is destroyed by this ability, do not resolve the effect of that ****SPELL**** ability.

artefactsOfPower.name: Shard of Night
artefactsOfPower.lore: This undead lord’s armour was crafted using elements of an abyssal stalker and grants the bearer that awful creature’s shadowy aura.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Ignore modifiers to save rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit (positive and negative).

artefactsOfPower.name: Orb of Enchantment
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: To glance into the swirling depths of this crystal orb is to become hypnotised by alluring visions and half-glimpsed futures.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy ****HERO**** in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: The Rising Dead
battleTraits.lore: Clawing their way through the soil and rock, more undead warriors join the fight.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is **in the grave**.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit wholly within 6" of a terrain feature and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Deathly Invocation
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Powerful practitioners of death magic are able to summon hordes of undead minions.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS **HERO**** to use this ability, then pick up to 3 friendly ****DEATHRATTLE**** or ****DEADWALKERS**** units wholly within 12" of that ****HERO**** to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
For each target:

• If the target is damaged, **Heal (3)** the target.
• If the target is not damaged, return a number of slain models to it with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.

battleTraits.name: Endless Legions
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: To the Soulblight aristocracy, the dead are mere chattel to be raised and expended.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-****UNIQUE** **DEATHRATTLE**** or ****DEADWALKERS**** unit that started the battle with 2 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS **HERO**** or wholly within 6" of a terrain feature. It must be set up more than 9" from all enemy units.

If it is your movement phase, you can set up the replacement unit more than 3" from all enemy units instead of more than 9", but if you set it up within 9" of any enemy units, it cannot use ****CHARGE**** abilities this turn.

battleTraits.name: The Hunger
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: Those who bear the Soulblight Curse constantly crave blood and are empowered by feasting upon their foes.
battleTraits.declare: Pick each friendly ****VAMPIRE**** unit that used a ****FIGHT**** ability this turn to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: **Heal (D3)** each target. **Heal (2D3)** the target instead if it destroyed an enemy unit this turn using a ****FIGHT**** ability.

battleTraits.name: The Unquiet Dead
battleTraits.lore: Animated by necromancy, the undead rise from their graves, balefire eyes blazing with dark purpose.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly ****DEATHRATTLE**** or ****DEADWALKERS**** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve **in the grave**. It has now been deployed. You cannot set up more friendly units **in the grave** than there are on the battlefield.

battleTraits.name: The Hunger
battleTraits.lore: Those who bear the Soulblight Curse constantly crave blood and are empowered by feasting upon their foes.
battleTraits.effect: Each time a friendly ****VAMPIRE**** unit uses a ****FIGHT**** ability, after all of its attacks have been resolved, **Heal (X)** that ****VAMPIRE**** unit where **X** is the number of damage points allocated by those attacks.

battleTraits.name: Swoop Down
battleTraits.lore: The sky darkens as the Vargheists descend.
battleTraits.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Spirit Gale
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Your general calls forth spectral winds that tear the souls of the foe from their bodies.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 7+, inflict 1 mortal damage on each enemy unit on the battlefield.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Aura of Night
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This black leather brigandine was crafted from the hide of an abyssal stalker and grants the wearer that creature’s shadowy aura.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to save rolls for shooting attacks that target your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Cloud of Bats
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Your Vampire Lord dissolves into a swarm of bats before reappearing elsewhere.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Remove your general from the battlefield and set them up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Grave-sand Shard
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared the ‘Skeleton Legion’ ability for a unit within 9" of your general
spearheadEnhancements.lore: By crushing this gem of vitrified grave-sand, the Vampire Lord can draw upon a surge of death magic to reinvigorate their resurrected warriors.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Add 1 to each **legion roll** made for that unit.

abilities.name: Prison of Grief
abilities.lore: Victims of this curse relive their tragedies, their will to fight replaced by self-pity.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Waste Away
abilities.lore: The wizard causes the muscles of the foe to atrophy, robbing them of their strength.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

abilities.name: Vile Transference
abilities.lore: The caster siphons the animus from nearby enemies and uses it to empower their necromantic powers.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SOULBLIGHT GRAVELORDS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them that has not been picked to be the target of this ability this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on that unit. If any enemy models were slain by this spell, **Heal (D3)** the caster.

abilities.name: Aristocracy of the Night
abilities.lore: These vampires are expected to excel in all martial and mystical disciplines.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **VAMPIRE** units that are not in combat and add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **VAMPIRE** units that charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Tide of Bones and Blades
abilities.lore: The relentless advance of these skeletal undead can overwhelm even the most tenacious resistance.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **DEATHRATTLE** units that charged in the same turn for attacks that target a unit that has fewer models than the attacking unit.

abilities.name: Horror Unending
abilities.lore: The neverending waves of deathly minions summoned by a Legion of Shyish shatter all hopes of victory for those who stand against them.
abilities.effect: You can pick 1 additional target when using the ‘Deathly Invocation’ ability.

abilities.name: Dragged Down and Torn Apart
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Hordes of shambling Deadwalker Zombies flow around and over their victims like a rotten tide, bearing them to the ground through sheer weight of numbers before tearing them limb from limb.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **DEADWALKERS** units in combat to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move.
• Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.
